      • getId

        public int getId()
        Description copied from interface: Cluster
        This method return the actual ClusterId. Please remember that the final and official ClusterId is defined by the Profile even if the Cluster is defined by a Cluster Library.
        Specified by:
        getId in interface Cluster
        Returns:
        the ClusterId

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Specified by:
        getName in interface Cluster
        Returns:
        This method return the String identifying the human readable name of the cluster. The name is assigned by the document defining the Cluster, either the Cluster Library or or the Profile

      • moveToHue

        public void moveToHue(int hue,
             int direction,
             int transitionTime)
               throws ZigBeeDeviceException
        Description copied from interface: ColorControl
        Sets hue according to HSV (aka HSB) color model.
        Specified by:
        moveToHue in interface ColorControl
        Parameters:
        hue - hue (degrees) / 360 * 254 in the range 0 - 254.
        direction - 0 = shortest, 1 = longest, 2 = up, 3 = down
        transitionTime - transition time in 1/10ths of a second.
        Throws:
        ZigBeeDeviceException - if connectivity or other exception occurs with the device.

      • moveHue

        public void moveHue(int moveMode,
           int rate)
             throws ZigBeeDeviceException
        Description copied from interface: ColorControl
        Moves hue according to HSV (aka HSB) color model.
        Specified by:
        moveHue in interface ColorControl
        Parameters:
        moveMode - 0 = stop, 1 = up, 2 = reserved, 3 = down
        rate - steps per second
        Throws:
        ZigBeeDeviceException - if connectivity or other exception occurs with the device.

      • stepHue

        public void stepHue(int stepMode,
           int stepSize,
           int transtionTime)
             throws ZigBeeDeviceException
        Description copied from interface: ColorControl
        Steps hue according to HSV (aka HSB) color model.
        Specified by:
        stepHue in interface ColorControl
        Parameters:
        stepMode - 0 = reserved, 1 = up, 2 = reserved, 3 = down
        stepSize - step to be added or subtracted from current hue
        transtionTime - transition time in 1/10ths of a second.
        Throws:
        ZigBeeDeviceException - if connectivity or other exception occurs with the device.

                          int saturation,
                          int transitionTime)
                            throws ZigBeeDeviceException
        Description copied from interface: ColorControl
        Moves to hue and saturation according to HSV (aka HSB) color model.
        Specified by:
        moveToHueAndSaturation in interface ColorControl
        Parameters:
        hue - hue (degrees) / 360 * 254 in the range 0 - 254.
        saturation - saturation * 254 in the range 0 - 254.
        transitionTime - transition time in 1/10ths of a second.
        Throws:
        ZigBeeDeviceException - if connectivity or other exception occurs with the device.

      • moveToColor

        public void moveToColor(int colorX,
               int colorY,
               int transitionTime)
                 throws ZigBeeDeviceException
        Description copied from interface: ColorControl
        Moves to color according to CIE 1931 Color Space.
        Specified by:
        moveToColor in interface ColorControl
        Parameters:
        colorX - x * 65536 where colorX can be in rance 0 to 65279
        colorY - y * 65536 where colorY can be in rance 0 to 65279
        transitionTime - transition time in 1/10ths of a second.
        Throws:
        ZigBeeDeviceException - if connectivity or other exception occurs with the device.

        Description copied from interface: ColorControl

        Specified by:
        moveColor in interface ColorControl
        Parameters:
        rateX - steps per second in X value
        rateY - steps per second in X value
        Throws:
        ZigBeeDeviceException - if connectivity or other exception occurs with the device.

      • stepColor

        public void stepColor(int stepX,
             int stepY,
             int transitionTime)
               throws ZigBeeDeviceException
        Description copied from interface: ColorControl
        Steps color according to CIE 1931 Color Space.
        Specified by:
        stepColor in interface ColorControl
        Parameters:
        stepX - step to be added or subtracted from current X value
        stepY - step to be added or subtracted from current Y value
        transitionTime - transition time in 1/10ths of a second.
        Throws:
        ZigBeeDeviceException - if connectivity or other exception occurs with the device.

        Moves to color temperature.
        Specified by:
        moveToColorTemperature in interface ColorControl
        Parameters:
        colorTemperature - 1 000 000 / color temperature (Kelvins) in the range 1 to 65279
        transitionTime - transition time in 1/10ths of a second.
        Throws:
        ZigBeeDeviceException - if connectivity or other exception occurs with the device.
